title: Sport mad Woody: The Woody Woodpecker show
brief_description: 10 stories featuring characters created by Walter Lantz. “The Contender”: There’s $5,000 prize for beating the defending wrestling champion, The Granulator. Believing TV wrestling is a sham, Woody lays down the challenge in a variety of disguises. “Snow way out”: Knothead and Splinter become victims to shyster ski instructors on the slopes. “Hospital hijinx”: Woody places himself in hospital in an effort to get some TLC. His plan backfires when he’s allocated Head Nurse Meany. “Over the top”: Wally and Woody have a dispute on which sport is better: snowboarding or skiing. They settle the score in a down hill race. “Chilly and the fur-bearing trout”: Chilly Willy attempts to capture himself the elusive fur-bearing trout so that he can get himself a nice, warm, coat. “Painfaker”: Mr Walrus is charged with nursing Woody back to health after he injures him in the park. A camera man accompanies them to ensure the court ruling is adhered to. “Pinheads”: Woody’s experiencing car trouble in the middle of nowhere. He spots a new car but has to beat Buzz Buzzard in 10 Pin Bowling to raise the necessary funds. “The Chilly show”: Chilly becomes the star attraction in a wildlife show. “Silent treatment”: Woody’s neighbour Wally is having a bbq and Woody is determined to get an invite. Wally is determined he can ignore him.
